t: Martina McBride - Eleven - Amazon.com Music
s: After two decades in the music business, Martina McBride is starting over. t: Martina Mcbride: Amazon.co.uk: CDs & Vinyl
Amazon.com: Greatest Hits: The RCA Years: CDs & Vinyl
s: Just a casual fan but do like her songs. Already have the Hits and More cd but decided to get this greatest hits vinyl. Definitely worth it with the super low price. Sound was superb and punchy. Vinyl was pressed well with no pops Highly recommended if you are a Martina Mcbride and country fan.
